subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Mark Cavendish, the 23-year-old British sprinter, won his fourth stage of the Tour de France, once again beating the other fastest cyclists on the planet by several bike lengths.
snippet: Mark Cavendish, the 23-year-old British sprinter, won his fourth stage of the Tour de France, once again beating the other fastest cyclists on the planet by several bike lengths.
